creditline: Gift of Elizabeth and Lloyd Olson in memory of Selma Groethe
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Two-panels stitched together lengthwise; weft stripes, bands of indigo and white, and indigo and yellow ikat alternating with solid stripes of varying widths in green and purple; some ikat bands intersected with narrow purple stripes; various ikat patterns; weaver's name, Eusebia Garcia woven in ikat band. Seems wide to be a perraje.
title: Woman's skirt (corte)
